meanings.definition: Not conforming to the rules of grammar.
meanings.sent1: Her nongrammatical sentences were hard to understand.
meanings.sent2: The teacher corrected his nongrammatical essay.
meanings.sent3: The cat wrote a nongrammatical letter to the dog.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a nongrammatical mess of misplaced flowers.
meanings.sent5: The nongrammatical speech sounded like a jumbled puzzle.

meanings.sent1: The nongrammatical text was full of errors.
meanings.sent2: She received a low grade for her nongrammatical writing.
meanings.sent3: The aliens spoke in a nongrammatical language.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were a nongrammatical chaos of words.
meanings.sent5: The nongrammatical sentences danced on the page, confusing the reader.
